content.text: can you tell me about the stiffness matrix

content: The stiffness matrix defines the relationship between forces applied to a robotic system and the resulting displacements at its endpoints. It essentially represents the rigidity of the virtual spring connecting the endpoint to the desired reference position, allowing for precise control and response to user interactions.
